replies.body:
I'm the most heterosexual manly man you could ever encounter. My masculine testosterone fuelled manliness is unmatched. Jonathan Joestar has nothing on the sheer awesome manliness that is me.

Did I mention that I'm totally cool and awesome? Because that is most definitely true. I'm not some dorky loser who sits around fantasizing about Sona x Ahri yuri, while self-loathing about how skinny and pathetic I am. Nope. I'm am very much the former. Totally.

add me on insta doh, mad respek fam DUNKNOE!

andrewjfaull

For a second, I didn't get it.

Then I realized exactly what you meant.

Of course, {{champion:77}} would be another appropriate ship due to his 4 stances.
y not make it the fearful foursome and add in fiora with her 4 vitals
he needs a fourth partner may I propose {{champion:79}}  for his four second ales

but that would make 5 person team, i propose fizz, cuz hes just tricksy enough to find upvoting jhin threads to 5 funny

edit: yes, it was i who upvoted to 5, mwahahahaha
I suppose he should crit on the 4th one...
